sentence.text: In a recent study combining autozygome and exome analysis, a homozygous loss of function mutation in camera-type eye morphogenesis (previously named regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase III) was reported in two siblings with isolated bilateral colobomatous microphthalmia from a consanguineous Saudi family.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase III

sentence.text: Herein, we report a third patient (not related to the previously reported family) with bilateral colobomatous microphthalmia and developmental delay in whom genetic studies identified a homozygous camera-type eye morphogenesis splicing mutation c.2968-2AAAAAT (p.Val990Cysfs*13).
This report supports the association of camera-type eye morphogenesis mutations with colobomatous microphthalmia and expands the phenotypic spectrum associated with mutations in this gene.
